title: 8-9am- Mo Mandel & Ranking Stadiums by Beer
itunes:title: 8-9am- Mo Mandel & Ranking Stadiums by Beer
description: Mo Mandel joins the show to talk about his upcoming show and his daughter, Vinnie is relearning math, some fast facts, a different kind of sting operation, ranking every NBA arena by the price of their beer, and Vinnie reads your texts!
